    • Constructor Detail

      • ToolCardController

        public ToolCardController(ToolCard toolCard,
                          int toolcardIndex,
                          Client client,
                          java.lang.Runnable afterActivation)
        Create a javafx controller for "ToolCardGUI.fxml"
        Parameters:
        toolCard - The toolcard whose description will be displayed
        toolcardIndex - The index of the toolcard that will be activated when pressing "Usa". (Needed to craft the toolcard activation request message)
        client - Reference to the client (to send the toolcard activation request message to)
        afterActivation - Callback that will be triggered once the request is sent (after clicking "Usa")

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
